allQuestion.explanation: Which of the seven deadly sins are you most guilty of?

answers.text: Extremely happy for your best frien
So jealous that you're angry at him or her.
You don't really care - good for your friend.
Confuse You should have gotten that job.

allQuestion.text: Your best friend just landed YOUR dream job, with a nice salary. How do you honestly feel?

allQuestion.explanation: Which of the seven deadly sins are you most guilty of?

answers.text: Way more than you know you'll eat. Hey, it's free!
Exactly what you think you will eat every week.
You limit yourself to a small quantity so you don't over-indulge.
A little more than you think you need, so you can share it.

allQuestion.text: You win an unlimited supply of your favorite food, which you can order every week. How much do you order?

allQuestion.explanation: Which of the seven deadly sins are you most guilty of?

answers.text: Hook up eventually - the chemistry is too hard to resist.
Let nature takes its course and see if it's meant to be.
Nothing - this happens all the time. You're hot.

allQuestion.text: You meet someone you're very attracted to, but you're already in a relationship. What do you do?

allQuestion.explanation: Which of the seven deadly sins are you most guilty of?

answers.text: You aren't surprised - of course you're fabulous.
You ask for more details about it.
You figure they are confused or teasing you.

allQuestion.text: When someone gives you a compliment, how are you most likely to react?
